ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islmim.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | islmim.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_islmim | |- ( F e. ( R LMIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R LMHom S ) /\ F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. ( R LMIso S ) -> F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) |
